contentrichtext.text: '''Frank Mannion''' is an [[Irish people|Irish]] film [[Film producer|producer]], based in [[London]]. Since 2002, he has run the film production company, Swipe Films. <ref> Swipe Films website http://www.swipefilms.com </ref> He has produced or executive produced:<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.allmovie.com/artist/frank-mannion-384965/filmography|title=Filmography: Frank Mannion|publisher=[[Allmovie]]|accessdate=5 April 2010}}</ref> *''[[Mad Cows]]'' starring Joanna Lumley, Anna Friel, Mohamed Al Fayed, Jodie Kidd & Sophie Dahl *''[[Divorcing Jack (film)|Divorcing Jack]]'' starring David Thewlis, Rachel Griffiths & Jason Isaacs *''[[Grand Theft Parsons]]'' starring Johnny Knoxville & Christina Applegate<ref> Los Angeles Times: ''A Crafty Filmmaker: Frank Mannion's charm and cunning helped bring the offbeat 'Grand Theft Parsons' to fruition and thus to Sundance ''http://articles.latimes.com/2004/feb/15/entertainment/ca-clark15</ref> *''[[In Prison My Whole Life]]'' with Colin Firth, Mumia Abu Jamal, Mos Def, Noam Chomsky, Snoop Dogg & Steve Earle<ref> Screen International: http://www.screendaily.com/in-prison-my-whole-life/4035418.article</ref> (international sales agent) *''[[Reverb (film)]]'' starring Leo Gregory and Eva Birthistle *''[[Beyond The Fire]]'' starring Cara Seymour and Scot Williams<ref> Irish Independent: ''Victims' fury as RTÃ‰ claims 'no appetite' for movie'' http://www.independent.ie/national-news/victims-fury-as-rte-claims-no-appetite-for-movie-2102876.html</ref> *''[[Flourish (film)]]'' starring Jennifer Morrison and Leighton Meester *''[[Geography of the Hapless Heart]]'' starring Bonnie Wright, Daisy Lowe and Douglas Booth. *''[[Jackboots on Whitehall]]'' starring Ewan McGregor, Richard E. Grant, Rosamund Pike & Tom Wilkinson He has an LL.B. from Trinity College Dublin and an LL.M. from Trinity Hall Cambridge. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata |NAME=Mannion, Frank |ALTERNATIVE NAMES= |SHORT DESCRIPTION=Irish film producer |DATE OF BIRTH= |PLACE OF BIRTH= |DATE OF DEATH= |PLACE OF DEATH= }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mannion, Frank}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Irish film producers]]
